A Beginning…to Forever!

Take my hand and let dreams follow. A fairy tale wedding, complete with dances and Margaritas on the beach.
Let The Raviz Kovalam plan a dreamy destination wedding for you. 
For bookings contact: 0471 – 3051234, 1800-4252-2220
mail: reservations.kovalam@theraviz.com, reservations@theraviz.com
